A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From the first moment when Luke tosses Anakin's saber I was startled. The movie continued to jolt my expectations and I was engaged through the whole of it. I instantly joined several discussion groups (something I hadn't done before) and we were all examining the movie. The only thing that stands out as weird was Leia force flying in space... everything else was amazing. I will be watching this again and again. It is better than Empire for me. Finally\, it's not just a fight between good and evil but it is embracing complexity like we haven't seen before. Even our villian is 'unfinished' in his drive to become the evil he imagines he could be. Wow. I'm still amazed.
